c-0: ^Awww, this is Mittens, she always loves to greet me on my way around Glimmering Creek. She doesn't seem to have a permanent home,
^but nontheless, she is beloved by the community and there's always someone happy to feed her.
c-1: ^this game is all about warm and fuzzy feelings. You should probably pet the cat.
